com.hazelcast.instance

Class DelegatingAddressPicker

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hazelcast.instance.DelegatingAddressPicker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AddressPicker

    public class DelegatingAddressPicker
extends Object
    Delegates picking the bind and public address for this instance to an implementation of MemberAddressProvider.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Address getBindAddress()
      Returns a server socket listener address.
      Address getPublicAddress()
      Returns a public address to be advertised to other cluster members and clients.
      ServerSocketChannel getServerSocketChannel()
      Returns a server channel.
      void pickAddress()
      Picks both server socket listener address and public address.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

                 throws Exception
        Description copied from interface: AddressPicker
        Picks both server socket listener address and public address.

      • getBindAddress

        public Address getBindAddress()
        Description copied from interface: AddressPicker
        Returns a server socket listener address.
        Returns:
        Address where the server socket was bound to or null if called before. AddressPicker.pickAddress()

      • getPublicAddress

        public Address getPublicAddress()
        Description copied from interface: AddressPicker
        Returns a public address to be advertised to other cluster members and clients.
        Returns:
        Address another members can use to connect to this member or null if called before AddressPicker.pickAddress()

      • getServerSocketChannel

        public final ServerSocketChannel getServerSocketChannel()
        Description copied from interface: AddressPicker
        Returns a server channel.
        Specified by:
        getServerSocketChannel in interface AddressPicker
        Returns:
        ServerSocketChannel to be listened to by an acceptor or null if called before AddressPicker.pickAddress()
